snippet.title: Swordsman VR - Official Gameplay Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
To learn more, join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/sinnstudio
Swordsman is a story-driven, physics-based medieval combat game designed for virtual reality.

Release Date: September 25, 2020 (North America / Europe regions)
PlayStation®Move Motion Controllers required.

The Jötunn travels to Earth in attempt to enslave all of humanity, wielding seemingly infinite power: Hellfire. Knights, Vikings, Mongols, Samurai, epic boss fights and boss weapons, player progression, a Blacksmith, Armorer and a Skill Master to help you build a character suited to your playstyle.

Developer: Sinn Studio Inc.
Publisher: Sinn Studio Inc.

#PSVR

Please review and follow all safety guidelines for use of PlayStation®VR. PlayStation®VR is not for use by children under age 12. PlayStation®4 system, PlayStation®VR and PlayStation®Camera are required to experience VR functionality.

© 2020 Sinn Studio Inc.

Rated Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence
